DefaultConstructor.remarks: A default constructor is required for a serializable object.

Clone.summary: Clones the structure of the object.
Clone.returns: A new object with the same structure as the current object.

Copy.summary: Copies both the structure and data for the object.

CompareTo.returns: The integer that indicates the order relationship of the objects.
CompareTo.remarks:
A negative integer - This instance precedes the compare-to object.
Zero - This instance and the compare-to object have the same position.
A postive integer - This instance follows the compare-to object.

Compare.returns: An integer value indicating the order relationship.
